title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 27 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 27 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: The Democrats January 6th commission starts off with falsehoods. Nancy Pelosi: "Insurrectionists attempted to overthrow the government." Dozens of Americans have sat in solitary confinement without parole for non-violent trespassing. Why was it acceptable for BLM to violently riot for a year without punishment? "Pelosi Republicans" make their voices heard. ESPN Writer Disturbed By U.S. Flag At Olympics: "I Keep Thinking Back On The Capitol Riots". Clay, Buck and callers have questions: Where was Capitol Hill security? Who shot Ashli Babbitt?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
